Text.Page:
This war has caused too many atrocities, too many deaths. Most nights I dream of the {@LinkCreature:32#6#Sihran defenders}, of the things they did in the siege of Acarum.

They could come back any day, unless someone takes care of them.

I wonder if this will stop the nightmares...but I'll take the nightmares over real Sihran defenders coming in the night to mutilate us.

Please report to {@LinkCreature:232#1002#Hallaj} at the Holdouts Redoubt on the southern slope of Mount Tyrannas.
Any casualties inflicted on the Sihrans benefit us. Your success is a success for all the federation.
